flawed_nl_solution:
The town used to emit 800 pounds of carbon a year because 80 x 10 = <<80*10=800>>800
20 now take the bus because 80 x 0.25 = <<80*0.25=20>>20
60 people still drive because 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60
Those 60 people create 600 pounds of carbon because 60 x 10 = <<60*10=600>>600
The town now emits 70 pounds of carbon because 100 + 600 = <<100+600=70>>70
The town emits 730 fewer pounds of carbon now because 800 - 70 = <<800-70=730>>730
#### 730

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 700, not 70. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
